data.text: @kerpen Okay...? That's still as many deaths as there have been since 2010.

@ladoodles @andrewbostom @kerpen @jeremyfaust @DrJBhattacharya Dr. Bhattacharya is glib and smooth and lies spill from his lips like honey. Completely loon stuck in March 2020 (or before) clearly self aggrandizing to gain stature. Sick

@davidzweig @jeremyfaust Actually it is done.  They ran the burden model for COVID through September.   (It's not perfectly apples to apples though because they put the NCHS count in as a floor, which they don't do for flu.  That upwardly biases the COVID estimates.)
https://t.co/gEOGEj3JMk

@jeremyfaust @kerpen CDC specifically says NCHS are the "most accurate" counts 

Also, on what basis do you think it's appropriate to apply your estimates methodology to ped Covid deaths? As @kerpen detailed, CDC explains why it estimates ped flu deaths but the same method is not done for Covid https://t.co/fs9augOP5n
@jeremyfaust @kerpen Why are you so intent on lying? What do you gain by it?
@andrewbostom @kerpen @jeremyfaust high five for "cretinous" and "drek" in the same sentence. 🤣
@kerpen Yet the 2-5 year olds still have to wear masks per CDC recommendation even with the new guidelines!
